front module

front.display_fig(fig)[source]

Display a matplotlib figure and close it to free memory.

Parameters:

fig (Figure) – Matplotlib figure to display.

front.get_ip()[source]

Get the public IP address of the user.

Returns:

The public IP address or an error message.

Return type:

str

front.init_data_part1()[source]

Load and clean the first dataset.

Returns:

Cleaned DataFrame for the first dataset.

Return type:

DataFrame

front.init_data_part2()[source]

Load and clean the second dataset.

Returns:

Cleaned DataFrame for the second dataset.

Return type:

DataFrame

front.main()[source]

Main function to analyze recipe data.

This function initializes and cleans the data, performs various analyses, and prints the results. It includes distribution plots, correlation matrices, quartile calculations, and linear regression analyses.

Returns:

None

front.toggle_dataframe()[source]

Toggle between DataFrames.

This function alternates the index of the displayed DataFrame.
